short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace new tab with a personal dashboard featuring prominent people that aided in the black power/black lives matter movement

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Weekly excerpts and photos that educate people on influential black figures that contributed to the black power/black lives matter movements(s). There is a famous saying that if you do not know your past you are condemned to repeat it, so this extension is an attempt to educate those who are interested in learning more about the past of African-Americans in North America.
